action.action-desc: Mrs. Mimi Walters of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the maximum amount of the lump-sum death benefit.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Social Security Lump-Sum Death Benefit Improvement and Modernization Act of 2015.

section.header: Increase in maximum amount of lump-sum death payments

subsection.text: Section 202(i) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 402(i)) is amended by striking $255 and inserting $1,000.
The amendment made by this section shall apply with respect to deaths that occur after the date of the enactment of this Act.
